    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120742</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120742</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Predmeti v zrcalu so  bližje, kot to izgleda</string>
            <string language="en">Objects in mirror are closer than they appear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachrichten im Spiegel sind genauer, als sie 
erscheinen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les objets dans le miroir sont plus étroits qu'ils
apparaissent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os objetos no espelho são mais próximos do que 
aparecem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli oggetti in specchio sono più vicini di 
compaiono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αντικείμενα στον καθρέφτη είναι πιό στενά από 
εμφανίζονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los objetos en espejo están más cercanos que 
aparecen</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Slika predmeta pri različnih tipih zrcal.</string>
            <string language="en">Object's image in case of different types of mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika predmeta</string>
            <string language="en">object image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wendeten Bild falls von den unterschiedlichen Typen
des Spiegels ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'image de l'objet en cas de différents types de 
miroir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objetaram a imagem caso que de tipos diferentes de 
espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hanno obiettato l'immagine nel caso dei tipi 
differenti di specchi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα αντικειμένου σε περίπτωση διαφορετικών τύπων 
καθρεφτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se opusieron imagen en caso de que de diversos 
tipos de espejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachricht Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image d'objet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem do objeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine dell'oggetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα αντικειμένου</string>

          <keyword>
